-- | Connector to Rackspace's Mailgun Service
--   
--   Allows users to directly access Rackspace's Mailgun service without
--   having to work with the underlying REST service.
@package mailgun
@version 0.1.0.4

module Rackspace.MailGun
data Message
TextMessage :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Message
from :: Message -> Text
to :: Message -> Text
cc :: Message -> Maybe Text
bcc :: Message -> Maybe Text
subject :: Message -> Maybe Text
text :: Message -> Text
HtmlMessage :: Text -> Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Message
from :: Message -> Text
to :: Message -> Text
cc :: Message -> Maybe Text
bcc :: Message -> Maybe Text
subject :: Message -> Maybe Text
html :: Message -> Text
sendMessage :: (MonadIO m, MonadBaseControl IO m, MonadThrow m) => String -> String -> Message -> m (Response ByteString)
sendWith :: (MonadIO m, MonadBaseControl IO m, MonadThrow m) => Manager -> String -> String -> Message -> m (Response ByteString)
instance Eq Message
instance Show Message
